a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Numeracy skills of adults young adults and adults, 2015
Young adults are between 16 and 24. Adults are between 15 and 65.
PIAAC: Mean Adult Numeracy Proficiency. Total
PIAAC: Mean Adult Numeracy Proficiency. Total
Data source: OECD Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC)
